original_text: and for all the work to be done by craftsmen, gold for the things of gold and silver for the things of silver. Who then will offer willingly, consecrating himself today to the Lord?”
korean_text: 금, 은 그릇을 만들며 장인의 손으로 하는 모든 일에 쓰게 하였노니 오늘 누가 즐거이 손에 채워 여호와께 드리겠느냐 하는지라

sentences.original_text: and for all the work to be done by craftsmen
gold for the things of gold
and silver for the things of silver
consecrating himself today to the Lord?
